title: Hot Topic Analytics for surveys
content:
Hot Topic Analytics in Survey Management enable you to analyze the answers to text questions in surveys.

You can analyze each text question individually, and filter by the answer time or by specific values related to the primary rating question of a survey.

The hot topics map displays answers received in the current execution cycle. For example, if a survey is in its second execution cycle but has not yet received answers, you will not be able to search through the results until you receive answers in that cycle.

To analyze a specific topic, click it in the hot topics map. To read the actual response to a survey question, click the result in the displayed list.

Related topics

  • Survey Management workflow
  • How to manage hot topic analytics
